4199753770d665dee7989ea73412bc44-14.name: RadiateU Home Page
4199753770d665dee7989ea73412bc44-14.content:
Online Learning • web3 • Community

RadiateU

A site for sharing knowledge and big ideas by the team at RadiateWP.

Join the Conversation

Limitless Possibilities

WordPress helped usher in the era of Web 2.0 and remains a staple of the internet today. The same technology revolution is happening today with Web 3.

From “crypto nuggets of the day” to free online courses on various WordPress topics, RadiateU is a forum that will evolve alongside the very technology it follows. Join us for the ride.

Join Us

Managing technology today

While Exploring the Next Phase of the Web

Online Learning

WordPress courses, and curriculum along with mini-courses for freelancers, site owners, and nonprofits.

Crypto

With our crypto nuggets, you can get “byte size” pieces of learning about the technology that powers the network behind cryptocurrency.

Community

The RadiateWP has always been dedicated to the larger community. This site is another way to give back.

4199753770d665dee7989ea73412bc44-802.name: 2 Column Quote with Content
4199753770d665dee7989ea73412bc44-802.content:
RadiateWP began as a service of custom webshop Positive Element and has grown to serve WordPress site owners nationwide. RadiateWP is now run by Carol Stambaugh and Jeremy Saxey who are leaders in the WordPress Community. RadiateWP has an incredible team to provide premium WordPress support and maintenance, including experts who understand WordPress from both the user and developer perspectives.

RadiateWP support specialists have extensive knowledge of the greater WordPress ecosystem that can only come from years of experience. Our team members are active in the local and national WordPress community, supporting WordCamp events and facilitating local WordPress meet-ups.

WE PRIDE OURSELVES ON OUR LONGSTANDING CLIENT RELATIONSHIPS AND OUR HIGH-TOUCH APPROACH TO SERVICE.

4199753770d665dee7989ea73412bc44-674.name: Photography – Senior Influencer
4199753770d665dee7989ea73412bc44-674.content:
We are looking for fun, outgoing, and creative juniors to represent us. If you like being in front of the camera and want a fun time with your senior photos, then you may be our next Senior Influencer! Senior Influencers are students who represent our studio. You are our face, our spokesmodels! All you have to do is tell your friends about us. Tell them about your experience and refer them our way. Pretty easy!

So WHAT'S In It For You?

It’s truly a win-win situation, we get your energetic recommendations to all your friends, classmates and family as well as your images to use in our marketing tools, and you get…

FREE ON-LOCATION FASHION SHOOT
PROFESSIONAL HAIR AND MAKEUP
2 FASHION DRESS RENTALS
OPTION TO EARN $1,000 IN PRODUCTS

Refer 5 paying friends to our studio and you get $1k in product credit!

Sounds GREAT, What Do I Do Now?

Requirements:
  1. You apply through our senior questionnaire for acceptance
  2. You agree to represent only our studio.
  3. You agree to hand out rep cards provided by us to all your friends and classmates.
  4. You promote and recommend us and share details of your session experience with your friends and classmates.
  5. You agree to allow us to utilize your name and image in advertising, both online and printed.
  6. You and parent (guardian) agree to sign a model release.
  7. To earn $1,000 in products, you must refer five paying seniors to our studio. You will earn an additional $25 in credit for each referral afterwards.

Ready to Get Started

apply Now

Want to Learn More

Senior Influencer Magazine

4199753770d665dee7989ea73412bc44-677.name: Photography – Senior Pricing
4199753770d665dee7989ea73412bc44-677.content:
Pricing

Hello! Below you will find our senior photography session fees (prints & digital products additional) for each of our fabulous offerings. A fifty percent deposit will hold your spot and guarantee availability.

The Runway - $150

Our fashion model experience will have you strutting your stuff!! Your session fee includes:

  • One hour of shooting in studio
  • Two outfit changes
  • Unlimited poses as time permits
  • Gallery reveal session to view your images
  • Signature edits on all purchased products

The Duo - $250

Can’t decide, get the best of both worlds. Your session fee includes:

  • One hour studio time with two outfit changes
  • One hour on-location with one outfit shooting in the greater Phoenix area
  • Gallery reveal session to view your images
  • Signature edits on all purchased products

Your gallery reveal will include both sessions so you can experience all of your amazing pictures at once.

Destination - $500

We love traveling with our clients or coming to you. Shooting in new and exciting places gets our adrenaline going. Rather you are local wanting to go to the beach or live far from Arizona, we can put together a destination shoot tailored for you.

Print and Digital Products

Approximately 2 weeks after your session, we will schedule your gallery reveal. During this session we will go through all of your amazing images and select your favorites. We offer a variety of print options including metals, keepsake books, and albums. Digitals are available as they are a great way to share with family and friends. View our product guide here.

4199753770d665dee7989ea73412bc44-684.name: Photography – About
4199753770d665dee7989ea73412bc44-684.content:
Hi, I'm Chris

Lorem ipsum dolor sit ame

…20 things about XXXXXXXXXXXXXXX…

… an oversized playmate to two adorable children …

… a husband to the most wonderful wife for the past 24 years …

… a wannabe basketball player who moonlights in Sunday city leagues …

… someone who wants to live in beautiful Colorado but currently lives in the Arizona desert …

… a Phoenix photographer who is passionate about photography and the way it moves people …

… that guy you see riding the shopping cart in the grocery store parking lot …

… a person who believes rules are made to be broken, shattered, and then stomped on …

… who believes black diamond runs are a skier’s best friend …

… was raised with a mid-west work ethic …

… thinks everyone should see Las Vegas at least once to appreciate the gawdyness …

… a die-hard college hoops fans, go Jayhawks! …

… a storm chaser …

… someone who has jumped out of a perfectly good airplane …

… drinks chocolate milk every morning for breakfast …

… dreams of traveling the world …

… never misses an opportunity to embarrass his children …

… believes that camping in the mountains makes for great vacations …

… a dog lover …

…believes tacos are the only food group…

… wants to be your photographer …

Work

View my Latest Work

There you have it, a lightning round about xxxxxxxx! Thank you so much for stopping by and visiting my site. Please browse the galleries and the blog to see my style. After viewing all those awesome shots, I’d love to make some for you. Use the form below or call me at xxx-xxx-xxxx.
